ValidationRule.description: ETQ is required- CAS: • Cate = CS - D – Complaint (by consequence Sub-Category = Complaint) • Cate= PSI - G – Complaint (by consequence Sub-Category = Complaint) • Cate = Complaint • CAS Solutions = Complaint - Forw PS: Sub-Cate= ETQ
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( Not((ISBLANK(EtQ__c))), Not(OR ((ISPICKVAL(PSI_Solution__c,"Complaint - Forward to EtQ")), (ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"CS - D - Complaint")),(ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"PSI - G - Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Category_Type__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"ETQ #"))
) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Remove "EtQ number CMP" Field value for selected field values for- Category,Sub-Category, Category Type and CAS Solutions fields.
